author: USA TODAY, James S. Robbins, Opinion columnist
title: Democrats try to hijack coronavirus stimulus for liberal Christmas in March
description: Every time the country faces a crisis there is a rush in Congress to pass massive bills that go far beyond responding to the matter at hand.
content:
You never let a serious crisis go to waste, as Rahms Rule says. Never was there a more concise summary of both the promise and dysfunction of American politics.
Every time the country faces a crisis, real or perceived, there is a rush in Congress to pass mas… [+4908 chars]
